    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static OneStepHelper getInstance(Context context)

      • isOneStepShowing

        public boolean isOneStepShowing()
        Whether in one step mode or not.
        Returns:
        true if in the onestep mode, or false if it fails anywhere. Returning false means the system was not in oneStep mode, can not drag anything.

      • dragText

        public void dragText(View view,
                     CharSequence text)
        Long Press and Drag to share CharSequence content text. For example: Smartisan Notes App long press and share an Article.
        Parameters:
        view - The View object which you long press and drag.
        text - The content which you want to share. Can be String SpannableString or any other implementation class object.

      • dragLink

        public void dragLink(View view,
                     CharSequence link)
        Long Press and Drag to share link. This Method will display a link icon when drag. For example: Smartisan Browser App long press and share a link address.
        Parameters:
        view - The View object which you long press and drag.
        link - The content which you want to share. Can be String SpannableString or any other implementation class object.

      • dragText

        public void dragText(View view,
                     CharSequence text,
                     Bitmap background,
                     Bitmap content,
                     Bitmap avatar)
        Long Press and Drag to share CharSequence content. You can set the style of popup bubble, For example: Smartisan Contacts App Long Press and share a contact.
        Parameters:
        view - The View object which you long press and drag.
        text - The content which you want to share. Can be String SpannableString or any other implementation class object.
        background - The bubble background bitmap. At the Bottom of Z-order. Suggest Size: 96dp x 87dp
        content - The bubble content bitmap display. At the Middle of Z-order. Suggest Size:66dp x 45dp
        avatar - The bubble avatar bitmap on the left(has a padding). At the Top of Z-order Suggest Size: 26dp x 26dp

      • dragFile

        public void dragFile(View view,
                     File file,
                     String mimeType,
                     String displayname)
        Long Press and Drag to share a File. We will add file icon for the drag bubble by the file extension and mimetype. For example: Smartisan FileManager App long press and share files.
        Parameters:
        view - The View object which you long press and drag.
        file - The File you want to share,
        mimeType - The mimeType of your file,
        displayname - The drag bubble display text.

      • dragFile

        public void dragFile(View view,
                     File file,
                     String mimeType,
                     Bitmap background,
                     Bitmap content,
                     Bitmap avatar)
        Long Press and Drag to share a File.You can set the style of popup bubble,
        Parameters:
        view - The View object which you long press and drag.
        file - The File you want to share,
        mimeType - The mimeType of your file,
        background - The bubble background bitmap. At the Bottom of Z-order. Suggest Size: 96dp x 87dp
        content - The bubble content bitmap display. At the Middle of Z-order. Suggest Size:66dp x 45dp
        avatar - The bubble avatar bitmap on the left(has a padding). At the Top of Z-order Suggest Size: 26dp x 26dp

      • dragImage

        public void dragImage(View view,
                      File file,
                      String mimeType)
        Long Press and Drag to share a image.
        Parameters:
        view - The View object which you long press and drag.
        file - The image file object.
        mimeType - The mimeType of image.

      • dragImage

        public void dragImage(View view,
                      Bitmap content,
                      File file,
                      String mimeType)
        Long Press and Drag to share a image. you can set the bitmap when drag.
        Parameters:
        view - The View object which you long press and drag.
        content - The drag bubble display bitmap.
        file - The image file object.
        mimeType - The mimeType of image.

      • dragMultipleImages

        public void dragMultipleImages(View view,
                               File[] files,
                               String[] mimeTypes)
        Long Press and Drag to share multi images.
        Parameters:
        view - The View object which you long press and drag.
        files - The array of file you want to share.
        mimeTypes - The array of appropriate mimetype.

      • showDragPopupText

        public TextDragPopupWindow showDragPopupText(View view,
                                             View.OnDragListener dragListener,
                                             String content,
                                             int x,
                                             int y)
        Popup drag window to share text. For example: Smartisan Browser App long press and share an select text.
        Parameters:
        view - The View object which you press it
        dragListener - The listener will be callback when start to drag the windown.
        content - The content which you want to share.
        x - The x position which you to popup window.
        y - The y position which you to popup window.
        Returns:
        TextDragPopupWindow
